## MDPI_journals

A dataframe with 430 journal titles and their respective sitemap codes.

::: callout-note
Last update: December 2023
:::

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(MDPIexploreR)
```

```{r}
MDPI_journals|>
  head(10)
```

## Submit your data set

If you wish to submit your own MDPI journal data set for it to be part of the `MDPIexploreR` package, the best way is to send/push your `articles_info()` output via GitHub in `.rda` format.
